verbose_text: The results from RT-qPCR and western blot analysis revealed that the transfection of the HK-2 cells with Lv-KLF4 induced an increase in the expression of KLF4, E-cadherin and ZO-1, and a decrease in the expression of alpha-SMA and FSP-1, and that this attenuated the TGF-beta1-induced downregulation in KLF4, E-cadherin and ZO-1 expression and the upregulation in alpha-SMA and FSP-1 expression (XREF_FIG).
